entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Revelstoke
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:16 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Revelstoke Airport 12:56 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.0°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -6.3°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 this morning and minus 7 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending overnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
